content.detailedDescription: I just read the report from wi and viewed photos. now i really feel like we all need to pay attention to this curiosity in our skies. over the last few weeks, i, too, have been seeing unususl chem trails in the daytime sky. a recent report out of tn, photos and a report out of in. and now wi. well now you can add pa to that growing list of sightings. report from tn states that some kind of flying vehicle keeps going back and forth creating these strange trails of white. what is so strange about this?....These chem trails don't dissapate the way you and i are familiar with. instead, they fan out and create a false cloud cover. it is bizarre to witness! one sunny morning last week, after countless fly bys, i noted that the sky above me was now cloaked in white clouds. on the numerous occasions that i've seen this occur, i keep asking myself, what could be the purpose of this. i am beginning to wonder what someone is trying to hide or disguise! afterall, it is the equivalent of pollution distribution. after a couple of hours there are literally lines and lines of this stuff in the sky. it ends up looking like blue and white stripes until it fans out and creates cloudiness. this is so strange to watch happening. i live on a mountain and can see alot of the sky. it's also alittle alarming. the fact that i've seen other unexplainable lights and crafts in the night sky from here only adds to the puzzle. i'm beginning to believe these events are all tied together. what do you think mufon?
content.summary: Vapor trails were noticed in pa.

content.detailedDescription:
I had let the dog out to use the bathroom, when i noticed that my dog suddenly stopped in his tracks and started to look upwards in a easterly direction. i then looked in the general area that he was looking, and saw a small triangular / chevron shaped object flying from the east, to the west. what struck me as strange about this object was that is was so small (less than 6 feet across), silent, had 3 light (one center and one at each end) and so very quick moving, as it seemed to be flying no more than 100 feet from the ground. if i hadn't noticed my dog looking for something, i certainly would have missed it!
the object quickly flew directly over my house, at which time i lost sight of it. when i went to the other side of the house (a second, or two later), the object was nowhere to be found.
i understand that it was early in the morning, but i had been awake for a few hours, so it wasn't because i was still not awake. 
it should also be noted that i regularly see aircraft flying in and out of cleveland hopkins airport, and this certainy did not belong with that group of commercial aircraft.
content.summary: Fast moving, small, silent, chevron shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back home from college in my car, on the 83 highway, late at night. my mother called to see when i was going to arrive home and i answered her call from my cellphone. i was on the passanger seat at this time, while a friend drove me home. my mother was upset i was coming home late, so i ignored what she was saying to me and instead looked out the windshield at a slight angle towards the driver's side. in the sky, across from alvarez rd (in between rio grande,tx and roma, tx)i saw a bright white light, a perfect sphere.  my first reaction was: "oh my god!! what's that!?..Oh my god..It's moving!!..It's f*king moving!" while the driver still drove at 55mph-60mph, i kept track of the object for about 3seconds. the object was not far up in the sky, but instead it seemed to be pretty low to the ground. i saw it moving down towards the ground as if it were going to land. it moved downward in the shape of an arc, a movement i believe no airplane or helicopter do when they plan to land. anyhow, i do not know if the object landed because i lost site of it once it got too low to the ground because of trees covering the site. i noticed there was a house near where the object was, but there may be more than just one. the driver did not see what i saw, but i wanted to ask people around the area where i saw this object if they had seened something similar to my story but i was too scared of doing that for fear of being called crazy.  what made me first notice the object was its perfect sphere-shaped bright-white glow. when i first saw it, i didn't think anything of it; until i saw it was actually moving downward as if to land, i thought it could be perhaps a ufo because of the way it moved downward, forming an arc path. during the siting i felt in disbelieve; it was very unexpected because i was not looking at the sky to find strange things, but yet there it had been very tangible. while still on the phone with my mother, i told her what i had seen: the bright white light shaped as a sphere. after the sighting when i got home, i asked myself what it could have been and started iliminating possibilities and i could not find an explanation for it. so i arrived at one conclusion: an unidentified flying object..Apparantly about to land.
content.summary: Moving sphere object with a bright-white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was out taking my dog dj. out for a pee. i looked up and saw a blimp like object that looked as a saucer shaped object that moved with no sound and no motor? it moved slow and it was dark matter that was the ship is the only way to decribe the way i realized how huge it was..The light behind the craft made it visible and you could see the boackness of the ship outline. you could see the errieness of the ship..I was so afraid just because of the size of this thing??I guess that i am in shock !!!My dog just looked at me fall to the ground ? why is this beeing a regular sight with just me and not all of the area???I just wish that the government could protect me and thne rest of society???I wish all of us (suvivors) could unite and demand the governments help in this matter??But we would probably just get the advising of broken bones and all? seems that that is all the gov. is use to do instead of uniting the way and truely starting a force that can automatically help us stop this unseen force. and somewhat unstoppable..
                        [cms/tg/pid]  if i keep seeing these ufo's i may have the cradentials of a ufologist? why not? [cms/tg/pid] out..The airport wouldn't say either way if or not there was anything in the sky that night?God bless and keep looking up!!!I was upset at the time and felt i should go inside to get more batteries. it felt ominous....Hope this situation doesn't get any more  vollitile. and i stop getting visits from ufo's. if i go missing i assure my family to never give up on me because i will never give up either..God as my whitness.Dr.K.H.Ufo logist .
content.summary: Ufo was atleast a football field in size and had 2 starlike pulsating stars at both ends centered.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out bay window in dining room facing west at approx 20-30 miles away over lake champlain / addirondacs ny noticed what at first seemed to be a helicopter. the random red flashes too bright at that distance to be helicopter. moved very fast side to side and diagonally instantaniously, and disappeared when i tried viewing with 10x50 binoculars and reappeared about 90 degrees to the north with-in a second. event is happeneing right now as i write. whitnessed by another person and myself. still to the north approx 15 degress above the horizon. and seen thru the trees approximatly 30 - 50 miles in the distance. red flashes to bright to be an aircraft or helicopter. remained in a fixed position for 20+ minutes. now appears further away to the north. the weather here is calm and clear skies, no clouds, and about 50 degree temperature.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Very unusual pulsing white light with random bright red flashes

content.detailedDescription: I was on my meade etx 125ec telescope looking at orion's nebula and this red light appears in my cross hair star finder in the dark. i see this red light blinking on my finder. so i looked around the room to see if any lights or red light were present but none it was all dark where i was. i looked back in it and it was moving in a pretty nice steady speed so i tried veiw it on the scope part and every time i tried the object would change directions as if it knew i was trying to veiw it. it kept the same northward direction it just moved front,back,up,and down movements still traveling in one direction. it lasted about 1 1/2 to 2min appr. until the building next to me blocked the veiw. so a red light far away,out of any air plane or any thing like that reach,moving pretty fast changing directions,heading northward,around 10 to 10:30 pm eastern time. i can't tell you what it was i saw i'm hopeing you can tell me but i can tell you i had tears in my eyes and i felt real cold and weird as i'm looking and afterwards i just wanted to tell everyone.
content.summary: Red light moving fast in all directions.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on the way home driving north on wadhams road pass smiths creek intersection when we saw a inverse equilateral triangle light up northwest of us above the tree line for about 30 seconds. the light was stark white no other colors in it.  it formed a perfect triangle, the light did not continue up in the sky like a spot light does,  but stopped at the straight edge of the triangle.
content.summary: Strange inverse equilateral triangle light flash in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My family (three of us) was driving from west bloomfield michigan to pontiac on telegraph road when we looked to our right, right before the oakland county court house and just after the summit place mall. there were two air crafts in the sky, seemed to be triangle shaped, extremely low flying, they seemed quite small maybe three-four feet across. they would touch one another and then shoot apart and touch each other again. it appeared to be a game of leap frog. both crafts had white, blue, and red lights on them.

we were not sure what the objects were, they appeared to be large kites, but kites cannot move the way they maneuvered. the driver refused to stop to allow us to get a better look at them; we saw them for about four to five minutes, long enough to know they were not kites. we lost sight of them quickly because we were moving.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two triangle shaped crafts, seem to be playing "leap frog"

content.detailedDescription:
See transcript included in report...
see attached documents...
first encounter 9 years ago (approximately)
second encounter 20 march at 12:14 local.

first encounter coordinates: 27.79264n by 98.36935w elevation 468 feet
second encounter coordinates: 27.80522n by 98.41231w elevation 522 feet

notes:
consuelo campos (2nd witness) refuses to testify.
elaine clarke (1st witness) claims imprinting of mental image of a small grey.

on 8 april 2010,at about 1040 p.M. (22;40) i was driving west on highway 12 from elma to aberdeen, washington. 
  i was in the middle of a sentence when looking at my friend a very bright light came into view. i knew immediately it wasn't any kind of conventional aircraft. 
  i am a private pilot and the first thing i looked for was any kind of navigational lights. there were none. the white light was so bright i couldn't make out any kind of defined structure. 
  at the time we were just emerging from a hail storm, the ceiling under the hail cloud was about thirty two hundred feet according to the nearest reporting station,hoquiam, washington. the object seemed much closer. but it could have been at an elevation of between one thousand and three thousand feet. 
  it moved at a high rate of speed. i would estimate at several hundred miles per hour. probably close to mach 1. it made an ascending, climbing turn of about ten degrees and then turned back to the left about 15 degrees and leveled off. it still looked very low. less than 2500 feet above ground level. in just a few seconds it had moved quite aways away. possibly as much as ten to fifteen miles. then it seemed to slow or even stop. maybe over aberdeen. but it was to far to say.
  being about the size of a small aircraft and being so bright it was easily outshining the stars that had come out after we emerged from the hail cloud.
  when i first saw the light i asked my friend "what the hell is that?!
  looking at it he then said the obvious " i don't know."
  it was in view in the western sky for maybe as long as ten minutes while we drove the highway. about five minutes out of aberdeen it disappeared from sight behind obstructions. as we entered aberdeen about five minutes later i looked for it. but i did not see it.
  on a side note: the cloud levels were obtained through a flight weather station.
content.summary: Driving on highway 12 we saw a very bright, maneuvering light flying fast at a low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette and was looking into the sky when i observed what appeared to be a very bright star somewhat low to the ground (aprox. 1000 ft). upon watching it for a minute the bright object dimmed to almost no light what so ever, at this point it has my full attention. as i continued to watch it moved like no aircraft i have ever seen going vertical and horizontal at incredible rates of speed. it also was flickering odd colors of light, i continued to watch until it faded into the distance when i came inside and googled "ufo sightings in michigan" and found this site i hope i can receive some sort of explanation for this occurrence. sincerely yours j
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a very bright light in the sky, thought it was a star...

content.detailedDescription: I caught this scene from a video poster on liveleak.Com   i doubt he even knew he caught this ufo. look on top the 3rd major drop
content.summary: Ufo view from rollercoaster.

content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing starlings in tomah, wi when i noticed a white object appearing and disappearing in my photographs. it seemed to be highly reflective of the sunlight and seemed to be moving from west to east. 

about 30 minutes later i noticed what looked like a spray plane traveling in the same path and direction at a high rate of speed and flashing some type of light or laser off the bottom of it. 

within 15 minutes of the spraying the sky was a complete white out. 

total elapsed time from first to last photograph is 49 minutes.
content.summary: Highly reflective white ufo appears followed by spraying and whiteout.

content.detailedDescription: On the afternoon of april 7,2010 my wife and i were traveling south in our car on hwy 77 somewhere past globe, az.  we saw a large circular white light appear in the distance (guessing 2-3 miles) moving at a high speed from east to west in a straight steady line and then dissapear behind a mountain.  we both saw this at the same time and aggreed a about what we saw.  it was traveling lower than the mountain tops.  this object caught our attention immediately and was with out a doubt a ufo.  ufos' are no surprise to us and we thought it was cool to see one.
content.summary: Saw a circle of white light travel very quickly from east to west and dissappear behind a mountain.

content.detailedDescription: While standing on my aunts back porch smoking when i noticed a bright white light comming from the gulf (west) headed east. i thought it might be an aircraft but there were no strobe lights or landing lights and no sound of an engine either. the night was cold and crisp  no wind and engine noises would have traveled well..It appeared to be about 1500 to 2500 feet in the air. the nearest airport is approximately 12-14 miles south of my location.  the trees were bear of leaves and i could see the light comming through the limbs. it appeared to be about a mile away if that. the strangest thing happened while i was watching, a falling star crossed in the bright white lights path. for a brief moment i thought they might colide in mid air. but they did not. i watched the bright white light until it was completely out of sight. and saw no more falling stars.       we do not usually have aircraft comming in from this perticular direction, that was what really peaked my curosity. i just watched the light and the falling star and really thought they might colide.
content.summary: While out on my aunts back porch for a smoke i noticed a very bright light comming off the g ulf

content.detailedDescription: Was working in the back by my shop and in the sky about a one - two miles sightly north of  west just west of us131 noticed a bright reflective shining changing a bit (like someone moving a mirror to catch and reflect the sun) went in grabbed my field glasses and when not reflecting towards me i'd see what looked like the wins of a large plane could not see a tail or nose was moving not very fast a steady course west - a little north altitude was changing they would pitch side to side slightly causing the reflection to flash at me that was when they would change altitude a bit at one point they held position for a few minutes just still in one position and then they continued at that time i quit observing them (2) and went about my work, after another 10 min i went in washed up and joined my wife watching a movie about 3-5 min after sitting down i muted the tv as i thought i heard something i sure did there were 3 helicopters i believe s-70a's they were pitch black,, coming from the east quickly at first as they were over the fields to our east we could hear them throttle back and seen them drop altitude a bit as they slowed down they started a slightly north of west track and ended up flying right through where i had seen the two reflective  objects when they were holding in one position and the choppers went in the same path as the object went after they were holding position i at first when seeing the objects did not think anything but shortly after the choppers which was 4:12 (i looked at the clock to see how long it had been since i seen the objects) it was at that point i felt it was something and decided to find somewhere to let someone know.
content.summary: Very reflective of the sun v - chevron shape

content.detailedDescription:
This report is for a coworker, his computer is not working. he and his girlfriend were driving north on i-5from woodburn when around the wilsonville exit nexted to frys electronics they saw lights so bright
it lit up like a football stadium. no school in the area. they thought it might be milatary but there was no outline of a craft.It was stationary about 300 ft of the ground.They drive this route everynight and have never seen this before. they lost sight of it while driving up the freway.
 lights were unlike anything they have seen before.
content.summary: Very bright lights about300ft off the ground not moving

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on i-17 south just past happy valley rd. when my daughter and i saw what appeared to be helicopter in the distance. the object had a very bright font and tail light. we thought it was odd that the lights were much brighter than helicopters we have seen in the past and lacked  blinking lights. the object appeared to be heading west of i-17. what we assumed to be the front of the helicopter was tilted downward as the other light was above the "front" light. the lights then became parallel evenly spaced. at this point, we thought the object was a plane heading north and that we were seeing the bright lights of its' wings. then it disappeared as if someone shut the lights off suddenly. 
my daughter were puzzled and started joking about being one of those people who claimed to have seen a ufo. approximately 40 seconds later, the object was visible again and this time it seemed to be much closer. it now seemed to be coming towards us again (instead of heading west) and the lights were extremely bright. the object moved slowly and smoothly- still evenly spaced. it once again moved west and then came to a still.The object was motionless and as we continued driving, we passed it. as  we passed the object, it appeared to be on the edge of the west side of i-17 (before 101 loop and i-10 exits). we drove by ( and somewhat under it). i slowed down, rolled down my window and saw that there was a thin object between the two lights. it was solid and the object was close enough to see a gray mass, (perhaps metal because there was a reflection off the mass caused by either the object itself or the lights on the freeway). no loud sounds...Nothing.  i tried to find an exit to pull off and watch it.  my daughter was able to turn around in the car and watch the object while i tried to find an exit. within seconds (and before an exit), it was gone. it is difficult to say how big it was. i believe it was no bigger than a blimp. it was close- close enough to see the underside of the craft.
there were other cars on the freeway. someone else had to see this. i wish i had answers to what we saw. i can't believe it is 2:26 am and i am not asleep...What was that?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright lights with thin cigar mass between them

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside to let my dogs out and noticed to crafts in the night sky to the northwest. i thought they may be planes at first and that they were too close together.  one of the objects had a red and a blue light and would fly in a pattern of circles and would go up and down in altitude very quickly, the other had a 2 rows of red lights on top of each other in a very distinct rectangular shape, it also did the maneuvers like the other but would disappear at times.  they seemed almost like they were playing with each other. there was no sound, but they seemed to be very far away.  i got my digital camera and took pictures of the lights as they slowly got farther away and then i got in my car to see if i could get closer to them as they left but they were gone by the time i put my dogs up and got in my car. i have a new laptop and cant figure out how to put in the compact flash card to upload the pictures.
content.summary: 2 crafts flying in erratic patterns--up/down--circles at night.

content.detailedDescription: Someone changed my story about the ufo next to burger king.. my friend and i were standing at different angles during the duration of the encounter; directly underneath, to the side and about 50 feet away. the ufo was about 25 feet in the air. after throwing pieces of tar at it for about half an hour or so, it slowly went up another 10 feet or so, then it shot up to where the stars were in about a couple of seconds. i was with my co-worker/friend..My mom saw it in the light about a week apart from when i saw it and my sister witnessed the extremely large triangle ufo on i-84 crossing above the highway slowly.
content.summary: Someone changed my story.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up one morning and went outside as is my routine.I noticed that the sky was infected with a ton of chemtrail activity so i grabed my camera and began filming the aircraft laying these chemtrails all over the place.

back and forth,back and forth they went for what seemed like forever..

it has always been a theory of my own these aircraft are masking the presence of ufo activity among other unknown reasons.When i see these aircraft with chemtrails..I always make it a point to look for ufos and many,many times i have seen "spheres" which always take on the color of their surroundings..If they are in or near clouds they will appear white and if they are in the clear blue sky they will appear transparent but discernible if you continue to look closely enough..

by doing this i have led a few people to see these craft when they otherwise didn't even believe in ufos..

i have witnessed ufo activity several times with the chemtrail phenomenon and this time i was armed with a camera.

i didn't see anything like i normally had previously but i did notice a faint object the shape of a "bell" directly above which seemed to be out of the path of these aircraft's pattern..I grabbed a pair of 10x binoculars and i picked up on the object so i pointed my camera in that general direction and started snapping images and i was able to capture a triangle/bell shaped object.It was stationary for several minutes before disappearing. i started to go inside and i felt like i should stay out for a few minutes more..That i hadn't seen enough and that if i went inside i would miss the craft if it returned or appeared in another part of the sky..

finally after about 3-4 minutes,i thought it was over when i began to get an feeling of being watched and i heard in my mind " turn around and look at me" and i caught it just before it disappeared..It is beyond my ability to understand...But i believe with all of my heart.. i was basically told 

"hello,here i am!!" like i was a participant in a game of "hide and seek"

this is not the first time i have been absolutely "compelled" to look at a direct spot in the sky and had a ufo sighting..

so i just i started snapping pictures indiscriminately and that is when i captured the faint sphere when i pointed my eyes in the certain point in the sky..

i have seen several ufos while watching the chemtrail activity in this area..I live in the appalachia mountains directly on a mountain top that is part of a state park with one part being very high bluff which overlooks the major city in this area and it has been a perfect spot to watch much aeronautical activity..Including lots ufos.

i only recently purchased a camera..But i have seen many,many ufos since being in this area..

these are only the images i have of this report..I have a few others but these were the first since i began filming and they were daylight captures..

the first image is a copy of the original and the second is a copy of the image with different color filters which bring out the craft from the background color of the sky..

the third image is of the craft that appeared and in my mind i was compelled to look and there it was observing me..It wanted me to see it!..Otherwise i would have continued looking in the other direction..

they have not been altered and are real..

i had to turn nearly 180 degrees to catch the craft in the third image after it compelled me to look in that direction..

i offer a little info about my background..I have held a high level security clearance for the dod and worked in intelligence with one of america's top tier defense contractors and i used to be a deputy sheriff.

i need to know why this is happening..

this event happened just like reported..There are many more and i think there is a reason for them..I am hoping to find out why!!..Maybe you can help me..
content.summary: While filming chemtrails ufos were captured on film

content.detailedDescription: Unknown occurrence.  i was out in the late evening bird watching and plane watching with binoculars.  the approximate time was 19:50 april 10, 2010, just before sunset.  i believe i witnessed a collision of satellites or something entering the earth���s atmosphere and breaking up.  at first i thought it was a bright star or the iss, but it broke into two distinct parts with a debris field behind it.  the objects did not seem to be falling.  it was not moving like the iss and did not streak across the sky like a meteor.  the two distinct pieces slowly drifted apart.  after a couple of minutes one of the pieces broke into two more pieces.  those also slowly drifted apart.  after sunset the light was failing and i lost sight of the objects.  i observed the objects/pieces for about 15 minutes, maybe a little longer.
content.summary: I witnessed a possible satellite collision or re-entry.

content.detailedDescription: This happened, first of all in a rural area, small community.  it was also near a ceremonial area i do not wish to disclose, for respect of the area and family.  my brother, his wife, her little brother and myself, were all sitting in a car that wasn't running at the time, bored teenagers, except for her brother who was around 12 at the time.  there was an inipi (sweat ceremony-lakota) going on at the time about a quarter mile away, north of us.  we were in the non-running car smoking cigarretes, and talking, and her little brother noticed a dim light of northwest of us.  he was starinng out of the back window, and told us, so we all, begin to watch it as it would go out of sight behind hills, and i would say we spotted it when it was about 5 miles away. i say this because we watched the object for about 15 min., or longer, it has been a few years since i talked about it.  but it got closer, about 3 miles away now, and split into 2 dim lights.  they would go back and forth real softly.  then it came to the top of the valley in which we were  in, the opposite end or northwest side, and turned into 2 lights ...One blue and one red.  the place where we were at has a creek running through, and encircles an island about quarter mile in diameter, and the lights went to each side, one at the south end, one at the north end.  when they did they immediately brightened so much, they lit up the whole island and a good part of the valley.  i focused on the blue light as it radiated so quickly.  what made us lose sight is fear, we didn't know what was happening, but i remember hearing a buzzing in my ears, like hearing static and low buzzing.  we all turned and ran, as we were standing at the top of the road parallel to the line up of the lights. her younger brother was so frightened he began to screem and cry as we ran, i was the last and was very frightened.
content.summary: 1 light that turned into 2 lights, one red and one blue.

content.detailedDescription:
This may be nothing but a weather balloon.  i am not sure, i was working in my back yard.  i was headed to a shed to pick up a tool. when i noticed something very high in the sky.  being a member of mufon and a part time astronomer (among other things).  i decided to just submit it to see if some one else has seen it.  anyway it was very slow moving north (a little west of polaris) no contrail, being white it stood out against the blue sky.  it was north of my position at aprox a 60 degree angle.  i ran into the house to get my nikon d-2x camera and 600 mm lens.  by the time i got back out, it was gone (less than 5 mins).

it could be nothing, it was not a bird nor a cloud nor an airplane.  being a part time amateur astronomer i know the difference between comets, stars or planets.  i can't estimate the height, when i saw it looked like a white circle about the size of the end of a 1/4 drill bit and very high in the sky.
content.summary: Spotted a white object high in the sky

content.detailedDescription: In this moment i would like no comment
content.summary: Brilliant lights orange to red to whites.

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking out side at around 1a.M. and saw a really bright star. i looked at it and thought maybe it was venus, and saw it change shape and color (withought binocculars)and was stunned. had seen the tv program "ufo's best evidence ever caught on tape", and knew right away it was the same formation of swiggle lines as the ones in the program that 3 different states reported. i watched all night (around dawn:5 hrs). from far i could see it move substantial distances in an instance, changing shape from a twinkle, to a star shape, to a diamond shape. the colors would variate red, blue, green, and white. with the binocculars (closer) i could see that the shapes i saw from further were actually being formed from 3 or 4 flourescent lines wrapping around one another, twisting, making all kinds of impossible maneuvers, and comming back together (just like i saw in that program where mufon investigated. i learned that when the object would move, thats when the formation of lines would change. for the most part, it just stayed still, like a star, but it was not a star. it was also silent, 100 percent the whole time.
about 3 hrs later, i physically saw as another, smaller on descended from the clouds, and just stop, on a dime a little further than the other one. same deal, exactly, only smaller. i had to go to sleep because i had to work the next day, but before i did, i took one final look out and saw 3 of them. the one bigger one, and 2 smaller ones forming the shape of a diamond across the sky. its been a few days now, and there has been, consistantly, 2 smaller ones in the sky every night, but further away. this is how i was able to convince my family of it. we are all very smart, level headed, have common sense, and are skeptical at times. i do know that what it was was not a man made spacecraft. we cant afford cameras of a descent video camera, but its the truth.
thanks,
js
content.summary: From far looks like star, close 3 color lines spiratic, intersecting warp speed

content.detailedDescription:
March 6, 2010 - around 4 am or so, i was tired, yet wide awake for some reason. i couldn't sleep that night and was trying to meditate inorder to relax, and i was finally really relaxing. then i heard an air force jet outside. the sound kept on for a while, so i opened my patio door, looked up and saw what looked like several individually hovering bright white lights, and a only few red lights. most were hovering at various somewhat high altitudes just north east of the flatirons mountain range, generally spanning over areas of central boulder. 

they were star-like, but not stars - too low & too large to be stars, and slightly moving/hovering... and softly pulsing, not sharply, steadily flashing/blinking as planes do. the air force jet kept circling round and round for quite a while, just under and through the area of the cluster of lights. (the air force jet seemed as if to discourage them from hovering any lower?) 

some of the lights seemed to appear and disappear randomly. one red light(orb) was constant and much lower and closer to me, appearing larger. it was glowing bright reddish/orange toward the center. 

there's a strange/interesting intuitive aspect to my experience as well. i felt there was some kind of connection/communication through telepathy... very difficult to explain. 

i was in a state of shock and amazement, i guess you could say. i didn't think to grab a camera. i didn't even watch to see how long they were all out there. i didn't feel afraid, but it did take a while to process the experience. it was very positive actually, and deeply profound. it gave me lots to think about. they looked just like other star-like/orb/lights i've now seen on youtube from sightings all over the world. wow... there really is something to this whole "ufo" thing. definitely worth investigating further... much to learn with all of this.
content.summary: Large cluster of white and a few reddish/orange lights, air force jet circling

content.detailedDescription: Walking outside in my neighborhood looking at the stars. precise location was carmel mountain ranch, in north san diego county. i noticed what looked like an extremely bright star right above a hill when looking to the west. the "star" then proceeded to get dim, so dim i could barely see it anymore, which was very strange given how bright it was just moments earlier. in fact, i remember thinking it was the brightest star in the sky at that moment after looking east, west, north, and south. over the next 4-6 minutes, the "star" proceeded to get very bright again, then dim, then bright, then dim, etc. but, not "blinking". the brightening and dimming happened gradually, with each event taking about 5 or more full seconds for it to reach a maximum or minimum. after watching this object glow extremely bright, then so dim you could hardly even see it anymore for about 5 minutes, it disappeared altogether! if it were a star, it would remain stationary, or move slowly across the sky at best, and remain visible in the same general location for a significant amount of time. but after being there for 5 minutes glowing and dimming, it simply was gone altogether! i was so perplexed by this i spent another 10 minutes staring at the same part of the sky (west) waiting for the "star" to become visible again. in fact, i just went outside again (9:09 p.M.) to look for "the brightest star in the sky", but to no avail. i am an avid sky watcher as i have seen anomalous things before a total of 3 times in my life. i do not report these things often, or at all, unless i am certain i have seen something "out of the ordinary". this event lasted about 5 minutes and was very peculiar. i am very logically based, and consider myself a practical and scientific person. however, after seeing strange things in the sky 3 times in my life, i now look up almost every time i go outside. this event is one that will stick with me, as this "star" was so bright it stood out among all the other stars in the sky for those moments, then simply disappeared after glowing at different intensities over a period of 4-6 minutes. i was excited, and still am, as i realized that this bright "star" was actually not a star at all. i just looked again (9:16 p.M.) and it's still not there, after being the brightest thing in the damn sky! truly awesome...
content.summary: Looked like a super bright star low and to the west in the sky, except got dim, then bright, then dim, then bright over and over again. then, simply disappeared altogether!

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends were at high rocks which is a park in pa. it is popular because it is a large cliff that falls off into a small river. me and my friends were there at night at around 3 am on the cliff edge. we suddenly saw a bright light above us that was brighter than the rest of the stars. it was very high up and seemed to be getting closer very fast. as it got closer to the ground we were concerned it was a plane that was going to crash.  it's light also got dimmer the closer it got to us. we were  very confused because  there was no sound until it was right in front of us. it was making a low humming noise like a bee or something. it flew by us left to right very slow and all of a sudden it darted off into the distance instantly. we were very freaked out after this because we looked behind us into the woods and there was a light in the distance getting closer. it didn't look like a flashlight though more like a lantern because there was no beam of light. we got scared and started for my car then we heard a very very loud whaaauummpp noise that echoed through the woods that seemed to be coming from nowhere in specific. my friend hurt his leg because he fell from being startled from the noise. we carried him back to my car. when i turned my key in the ignition my car would not start which was very scary because the light in the woods was getting closer. suddenly the light went out and my car turned on and we were out of there.
content.summary: Ufo flew twenty meters in front of me and my friends

content.detailedDescription: My sighting occurred in the evening on am moonless night that i can recall at approximately 8:00pm.  i was sitting with my child in our driveway playing when directly north of my home in the sky (distance unknown, but at least several miles away it appeared) i noticed an extremely bright whitish/orangish round light source appear in the sky. the light remained lit for about 5 to 10 seconds and then went out.  the continued to light up and go out in the same fashion at the exact same point in the sky for a number of minutes, maybe 15 to 20 minutes if i recall correctly.  while i was observing this light my wife arrived home in our car and i immediately showed the light source to her, which my wife also found to be unusual and atypical.  there was no sound being emitted from the light source that we could hear.  while my wife and i were observing the light source we noticed two much smaller and dimmer red light orbs moving about in a circular fashion well to the side and in the distance of the larger light source.  the two red orbs seemed to fly in circular patterns from a low point in the sky to a higher point in the sky, repeating this several times.  we only observed the red orbs for maybe a couple of minutes before we noticed that the larger light source had gone out.  we eventually notice that the two red orbs started moving closer to our home, but still high in the sky.  as the red orbs got closer to our home they eventually seemed to merge with one another and disappeared.  as i recall i went into my home to get my binoculars.  i looked into the sky with the binoculars and observed what appeared to be a massive triangular/boomerang shaped craft fly directly over my home with absolutely no sound at all.  my wife also saw the craft.  the craft had no visible lights or windows, but to my recollection is seemed to somewhat translucent and/or capable of warping/bending the light of the stars around it.  the craft was moving in the exact direction of tyndall afb, fl.  tyndall afb is only a 20 minute drive (maybe about 8 to 10 miles from my home).  the craft moved in a very smooth motion and was not traveling extremely fast nor extremely slow.  if i had to guess the speed it was maybe a 120 to 150 miles per hour or so.  we eventually lost sight of the craft in the distance and have never seen the craft or related phenomenon since.  we were extremely anxious, curious, and excited upon seeing the strange lights in the sky and especially when we observed the craft.  i did report this incident to the "ufo hunters", but never received a reply.
content.summary: Bright large light blinking on an off, smaller red orbs circling around in distance, flying triangle overhead.
